des:
Hardware Requirements:
1. Espirit Smart Lock
2. Gateway - sold separately
3. Echo/Dot

Get Started:

1. Check that the Espirit app is able to lock/unlock using Bluetooth.

2. Check that the Espirit app is able to “remotely” lock/unlock using the Espirit Plus hub

3. Enable the Espirit Smart Home skill in Alexa

4. Link the Espirit Smart Lock account and provide permission to access your locks.

5. Once Alexa discovers the Espirit Smart Lock, you can issue voice commands to Alexa as outlined below:

Alexa, lock the door lock
(door lock is the name of smart lock,you can rename the smart lock in the Espirit app)
Alexa, unlock the door lock
(you should enable unlock feature in Alexa app)

Notice:some locks dose not support unlock or lock status report, the status will always be locked.
